about_the_game:
END: Awakening is a narrative-based action-survival game in which you and up to three friends must gather resources, craft weapons and tools, and upgrade your cabin into the ultimate anti-zombie fortress! Venture out into the wilds ruled by brutal Rustler scavengers, or the undead-infested Whitestone City to collect food, water, and medical supplies. Solve puzzles and carefully choose between sneaking and fighting to defeat both human and undead enemies in order to advance the plot and begin to unravel Hecate’s twisted plan.

FEATURES

  • Deep Storyline Rooted in Greek Mythology: The Witch-Goddess Hecate has imprisoned all of Olympus in order to unleash her undead wrath upon the world! The enigmatic Hexa corporation manipulates the disaster! Strike out and unearth the mystery!

  • Survive the Apocalypse Side By Side: Join up to three friends on your adventure! Forage together, craft together, explore together, and fight together!

  • Intense Loot-Driven Gameplay: Explore for food and water, medicine and ammunition, as well as powerful weapons and vehicles! Scavenge for resources and materials to upgrade your survival-tools and improve your shelter, fortifying it against all attackers!

  • Face the Apocalypse Your Way: Every encounter tests your skills, reflexes, and decision-making. Will you fight your enemies directly? Will you sneak past them? Will you set traps and ambushes to turn things to your favor before making your move? The choice is yours– as are the consequences.

  • Run, Jump, Glide, Drive: END offers an enormous variety of locations to explore, and exploit. Fight your way through the densely packed city of Whitestone! Scavenge the forests and farms for precious resources! Descend into dangerous military bunkers to face puzzles and powerful enemies, and earn your shot at the rarest loot!

TAKE CONTROL OVER THE APOCALYPSE


The open world of “END: Awakening” is alive and ever-shifting. Factions such as the meddling Hexa Corporation and the aggressive Rustlers, along with allies such as Charlotte, Logan, and Celine all offer their own unique resources and questlines to earn their favor– or their ire. Carefully choose to align yourself with; every choice matters, and changes the final fate of the Earth, and what remains of humanity.

CONSTRUCT THE ULTIMATE SURVIVAL FORTRESS


Fortify and upgrade your simple starting cabin into the ideal stronghold! Gather resources to construct powerful defenses such as landmines, Zombie Attractors, spikes, and barricades, and stations for resting and replenishing health for your team. Craft more powerful weapons, increasing damage, range, and carnage! In End, the apocalypse is what you and your friends make of it.

CONSTRUCT THE ULTIMATE SURVIVAL FORTRESS


END: Awakening presents a unique story in a unique setting– Ancient Greek Mythology spilling over into a modern zombie apocalypse, as the underworld itself spills out into a dense urban environment! The mystical and mysterious Hecate has imprisoned all the Greek Gods and Goddesses for allowing the world to fall into disrepair– but is the shadowy Hexa corporation working for her or against her? END’s will keep you on your toes at every turn, as you struggle to survive!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: END: Awakening is a greek myth-inspired, action-adventure survival game that throws you and your friends into a terrifying undead apocalypse. Fight to survive the relentless undead by scavenging, crafting, and building in an expansive co-op experience. Can you live through the END?
